SELECT ui.user_id userId, ui.user_name userName, ui.real_name realName, ui.phone, ac.aval_amount avalAmount, ac.aval_amount * ac.rate cnstAmount FROM T_ACCT_INFO ac LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO ui ON ac.user_id = ui.user_id WHERE
ui.STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} and
ac.aval_amount >0 and ui.user_type='1'
select u.user_name recommUserName, rr.create_time createTime from T_RECOMM_REL_INFO rr LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO u on rr.recomm_user_id=u.user_id where rr.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT er.id, er.amount, ui.user_name userName, ui.attach_url attachUrl FROM T_EXPORT_RECORD er JOIN T_USER_INFO ui ON er.user_id = ui.user_id WHERE er.STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}
